snippet: A video of Al Armendariz saying he sought to “crucify” companies breaking regulations as a deterrent to others had been circulated by Republican foes of President Obama’s environmental policy.
abstract: Al Armendariz, the top Environmental Protection Agency official in Texas, resigns after Republican foes of Pres Obama's environmental policy circulate a two-year-old video of a speech in which he declared that the agency should hit polluting companies with its full powers, citing the Roman practice of crucifying enemies as a deterrent.
lead_paragraph: A video of Al Armendariz saying he sought to “crucify” companies breaking regulations as a deterrent to others had been circulated by Republican foes of President Obama’s environmental policy.

headline.seo: E.P.A. Official in Texas Resigns Over ‘Crucify’ Comments
headline.main: E.P.A. Official in Texas Quits Over ‘Crucify’ Video
